meta.title: TradingAI | Perception Lab
meta.description: TradingAI is an AI-powered trading platform delivering daily rule-based and AI-based setups.
hero.title: Perception Lab â€“ AI-powered Market Setups
hero.subtitle: The Perception Engine blends rule-based market analysis with AI to deliver clear, objective, and tradable setups every day.
homepage.hero.headline: Setup of the Day
homepage.list.headline: More setups
homepage.info.title: What is the Perception Lab?
homepage.info.p1: The Perception Lab blends rule-based market analysis with AI-powered signals. The system scores event strength, market bias, sentiment, and orderflow to produce structured trading setups.
homepage.info.p2: Each setup includes entry zones, stop-loss, take-profit, confidence values, and key market indicators  at a glance and fully emotion-free.
homepage.info.p3: Combining fixed analysis rules with AI models creates a clear, consistent decision framework for your daily trading workflow.
homepage.info.cards.analysis.title: AI-powered analysis
homepage.info.cards.analysis.body: Rule-based systems combined with AI for precise market assessments.
homepage.info.cards.multi.title: Multi-factor scoring
homepage.info.cards.multi.body: Event strength, market bias, sentiment, and orderflow are evaluated systematically.
homepage.info.cards.clear.title: Clear setups
homepage.info.cards.clear.body: Objective setups with entry, stop-loss, take-profit  updated daily.
homepage.info.cards.consistent.title: Consistent decisions
homepage.info.cards.consistent.body: Reproducible analyses without emotional bias or subjective interpretation.
homepage.cta.title: Unlock more setups
homepage.cta.subtitle: Right now you only see a selection. Premium gives you access to all daily setups, AI interpretations, multi-asset analysis, and alerts.
marketing.noSetupOfDay: No setup of the day available.
perception.title: Perception Lab  Analysis Engine
perception.subtitle: The Perception Engine blends market structure, events, bias and sentiment into clear setups.
perception.intro1: The Perception Engine processes market structure, events and sentiment to produce daily snapshots with clearly defined setups.
perception.intro2: Sources include structure analysis, macro/micro events and sentiment signals. Each day a snapshot is published on the landing page.
perception.engine.events: Economic data, news and risk factors  score
perception.engine.sentiment: Funding, fear/greed and flow data  bias
perception.snapshotHint: On the landing page you see a daily snapshot of all setups produced. The Perception page explains the underlying system.
perception.today.title: Live snapshot
perception.today.error: Unable to retrieve the latest snapshot.
perception.riskReward.title: Risk & Reward
perception.riskReward.tooltip.rrrDefault: Reward-to-risk shows opportunity sizing, so you can spot setups with more upside than downside.
perception.riskReward.tooltip.rrr.weak: RRR {rrr}: weak chance/risk; only attractive with very high hit rate.
perception.riskReward.tooltip.rrr.ok: RRR {rrr}: solid. Works for standard signals; manage size with confidence.
perception.riskReward.tooltip.rrr.strong: RRR {rrr}: strong leverage potential; small size can be enough. Align with confidence.
perception.riskReward.tooltip.volatility: Volatility captures how wild the move is  higher values mean wider swings.
perception.riskReward.riskNote.low: Risk per trade {risk} (low)  fits conservative sizing.
perception.riskReward.riskNote.medium: Risk per trade {risk} (medium)  standard sizing if setup quality is solid.
perception.riskReward.riskNote.high: Risk per trade {risk} (high)  consider partials even with good RRR {rrr}.
perception.riskReward.rrrNote.weak: RRR {rrr}: weak chance/risk  needs strong conviction or better entry.
perception.riskReward.rrrNote.ok: RRR {rrr}: solid balance  suitable for typical setups.
perception.riskReward.rrrNote.strong: RRR {rrr}: strong  small position can deliver good payoff.
perception.rings.tooltip.trend: Trend strength derived from structure, momentum, and volatility.
perception.rings.tooltip.event: Impact of economic and news events on the setup.
perception.rings.tooltip.bias: Modeled market bias capturing structural preferences.
perception.rings.tooltip.orderflow: Capital flow derived from momentum and volatility.
perception.rings.tooltip.confidence: Overall confidence: how well all five rings align.
perception.rings.explainerTitle: The 5 Rings of the Perception Lab
perception.rings.explainerIntro: Each setup is evaluated through five rings that explain why a signal feels strong or weak.
perception.rings.desc.trend: Combines trend structure, momentum, and volatility into a 0100 trend strength score.
perception.rings.desc.event: Rates how strongly economic and news events can affect this setup.
perception.rings.desc.bias: Captures structural market biases such as preferred directions or regimes.
perception.rings.desc.sentiment: Measures market and news sentiment via an AI model.
perception.rings.desc.orderflow: Describes capital flow derived from momentum and volatility.
perception.rings.desc.confidence: Shows how well all five rings align and how confident the model is about the setup.
perception.rings.eventTooltip: Measures volatility shocks, momentum divergence and pattern-based events.
perception.rings.biasTooltip: Highlights the technical bias from trend strength and regime shifts.
perception.rings.sentimentTooltip: Mixes direction, bias strength and momentum energy into a mood indicator.
perception.rings.orderflowTooltip: Signals how strong the active market flow is.
perception.rings.confidenceTooltip: Aggregated meta-signal from the five rings and structural rules.
perception.rings.explainer.event: Event ring captures volatility shocks, momentum divergence and pattern signals.
perception.rings.explainer.bias: Bias ring highlights the prevailing technical direction.
perception.rings.explainer.sentiment: Sentiment ring mixes direction, bias and momentum energy.
perception.rings.explainer.orderflow: Orderflow ring visualizes the strength of active market flows.
perception.rings.explainer.confidence: Confidence is the meta-score from the other rings plus structural filters.
perception.rings.insights.title: Ring insights
perception.rings.insights.subtitle: Quick heuristics based on todays scores.
perception.rings.confluence.title: Confluence
perception.rings.confluence.mixed: Confluence mixed: drivers {drivers}, weakness {weakness}; confidence {confidence}% ({confBucket}), RRR {rrr}.
perception.rings.confluence.noEdge: No clear confluence: weakness {weakness}; confidence {confidence}% ({confBucket}), RRR {rrr}.
perception.rings.summary.noEdgeLong: No clear edge: all rings are in the middle; treat this more as a watchlist candidate than a high-conviction trade.
perception.rings.summary.noEdgeFact: No clear edge (all rings medium, RRR < 2)
perception.rings.summary.eventDriverLong: The setup is heavily driven by the upcoming macro event  expect volatility around the release window.
perception.rings.insights.trend.low: Trend weak ({score}%) on {timeframe}; {asset} is rangey/pulling back, little directional edge.
perception.rings.insights.trend.medium: Trend moderate ({score}%) on {timeframe}; some direction, but not dominant on {asset}.
perception.rings.insights.trend.high: Strong {direction} trend ({score}%) on {timeframe}; {asset} is clearly trending.
perception.rings.insights.event.low: Event risk low ({score}%); little catalyst impact expected.
perception.rings.insights.event.medium: Event risk moderate ({score}%); keep news in view, recent catalysts priced in.
perception.rings.insights.event.high: Event risk high ({score}%); manage size/stops proactively.
perception.rings.insights.sentiment.low: Sentiment weak ({score}%); crowd skewed against {direction}, reversal risk higher.
perception.rings.insights.sentiment.medi: Sentiment balanced ({score}%); no extreme crowd read.
perception.rings.insights.sentiment.high: Sentiment strong ({score}%); crowd positioned {direction}, watch for overextension.
perception.rings.insights.orderflow.low: Flow weak ({score}%); limited participation, trend may thin out.
perception.rings.insights.orderflow.medi: Flow neutral ({score}%); active market but still fairly light pressure.
perception.rings.insights.orderflow.high: Flow strong ({score}%); {direction} participation backs the setup.
perception.rings.insights.confidence.low: Confidence low ({score}%): signals diverge; observe or trade small.
perception.rings.insights.confidence.med: Confidence medium ({score}%): mixed picture, size accordingly.
perception.rings.insights.confidence.hig: Confidence high ({score}%): rings aligned; setup belongs on the watchlist.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.title: Trade signal
perception.tradeDecision.signal.strongLo: {asset} {direction} on {timeframe}: strong trend/bias backing the move.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.strongSh: {asset} {direction} on {timeframe}: strong trend/bias backing the move.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.coreLong: Drivers in place; risk/rrr balanced for {asset} on {timeframe}.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.coreShor: Drivers in place; risk/rrr balanced for {asset} on {timeframe}.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.cautious: Mixed signals or elevated risk: manage size and timing carefully.
perception.tradeDecision.signal.noEdge.t: No dominant drivers; watchlist or avoid for now.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.title: Trader playbook
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.highEv: Macro: Rund um das Event eher abwarten, keine frischen Einstiege direkt vor oder nach dem Release.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.medium: Macro-Risiko mittel  Setup ist handelbar, aber mit Spikes rund um News rechnen.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.lowEve: Macro-Lage ruhig  Fokus auf Struktur, Flow und Ausfhrung.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.lowRRR: RRR weak (<2)  not a core trade.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.moment: Momentum play  don't fade strong flow.
perception.tradeDecision.playbook.defaul: Align with strongest drivers, respect risk.
perception.tradeDecision.positioning.tim: Timing gut – stabiler Flow, Event-Risiko niedrig/mittel.
Timing solide – Events im Blick, ggf. Teilposition.
Timing riskant – hohes Event-Risiko oder geringe Confidence; warten oder Größe reduzieren.
Trend-Timing – Struktur und Bias zeigen in dieselbe Richtung.
Flow-getriebenes Timing – Momentum/Tape erlaubt taktische Einstiege.
Event-Risiko-Timing – Pulver trocken halten bis die Katalysatoren durch sind.
features.title: What is the Perception Lab?
features.block1.title: AI-powered analysis
features.block1.text: Rule-based system plus AI for precise market assessments.
features.block2.title: Multi-factor scoring
features.block2.text: Event strength, bias, sentiment and orderflow are evaluated systematically.
features.block3.title: Clear setups
features.block3.text: Objective setups with entry, stop-loss, take-profit  updated daily.
features.block4.title: Consistent decisions
features.block4.text: Reproducible analyses without emotions or subjective bias.
cta.title: Unlock more setups
cta.subtitle: Free shows only a selection. Premium gives you all daily setups, AI interpretations, multi-asset analysis and alerts  all in one place.
pricing.title: Pricing & Plans
pricing.subtitle: Free to start, Premium for active traders, Pro for automation and API.
pricing.free.title: Free
pricing.premium.title: Premium
pricing.pro.title: Pro
pricing.comparison.title: Comparison
pricing.apiInfo.title: API Access
pricing.apiInfo.text: Pro users can access API and webhooks to pull setups & scores into their own systems. More details in the docs.
footer.copy: {year} TradingAI  Perception Lab. All rights reserved.
footer.risk: No financial advice. Trading involves risk.
docs.overview.title: TradingAI Docs  Overview
docs.overview.intro: A quick start into the TradingAI API, setups and automation.
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.title: What you can do with the API
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.setups.title: Fetch daily setups
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.setups.body: Pull all daily setups including entry/SL/TP, confidence and scores.
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.events.title: Score events
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.events.body: Capture macro events, news and risk factors and feed them into workflows.
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.sentiment.bod: Query funding, flow and sentiment signals to identify market tendencies.
docs.overview.whatYouCanDo.automation.bo: Trigger webhooks, cron jobs and custom alerts based on scores and setups.
docs.overview.quickstart.title: Quickstart
docs.overview.quickstart.step1Body: Create an API key in your account (Pro/Enterprise).
docs.overview.quickstart.step2Body: Call the setups endpoint and filter by symbol/timeframe.
docs.overview.quickstart.step3Body: Use webhooks or cron jobs to watch scores and send alerts.
docs.overview.concepts.title: Core Concepts
docs.overview.concepts.setup: Setup: Structured trading plan with entry, SL, TP and confidence.
docs.overview.concepts.event: Event: Macro/news incident with weighting for risk/volatility.
docs.overview.concepts.score: Score: Weighted value from event, bias, sentiment, balance.
docs.overview.concepts.stream: Streams: Data streams (setups, scores, events) for automation.
docs.overview.limits.title: Limits & Fair Use
docs.overview.limits.point1: Rate limits protect stability  avoid excessive bursts.
docs.overview.limits.point2: Setups are snapshots per day/timeframe; no tick feed.
docs.overview.limits.point3: API keys are personal; do not expose them publicly.
docs.api.title: API Reference
docs.api.intro: Fetch setups, scores and events via the TradingAI API.
docs.api.auth.title: Authentication
docs.api.auth.body: Use a Bearer token (API key) from your account under API Keys. Send it in the Authorization header.
docs.api.endpoints.title: Core Endpoints
docs.api.endpoints.setupDetail: GET /v1/setups/{id}  Detail of a setup incl. scores.
docs.api.endpoints.events: GET /v1/events  Relevant macro/news events with scores.
docs.api.endpoints.sentiment: GET /v1/sentiment  Sentiment and bias data per asset.
docs.api.notes.title: Notes
docs.api.notes.body: Mind rate limits and pagination. Check dates (snapshot per day/timeframe).
docs.webhooks.title: Webhooks
docs.webhooks.intro: Receive events and setups via push as soon as new data is available.
docs.webhooks.howItWorks.title: How it works
docs.webhooks.howItWorks.step1: Register your webhook URL in your account.
docs.webhooks.events.title: Events
docs.webhooks.security.title: Security
docs.webhooks.security.body: Verify signatures, keep secrets private, consider replay protection (timestamp/nonce).
docs.sdks.title: SDKs
docs.sdks.intro: Use TradingAI easily via SDKs for your preferred language.
docs.sdks.languages.title: Supported SDKs
docs.sdks.installation.title: Installation
docs.sdks.nextSteps.title: Next steps
docs.sdks.nextSteps.body: Test auth, make your first setup call, then configure alerts/automation.
docs.examples.title: Examples
docs.examples.intro: Short snippets to get started with the API.
docs.examples.example1.title: TypeScript: Fetch setups
docs.examples.example1.body: Example GET /v1/setups call with API key and a simple filter.
docs.examples.example2.title: Python: Fetch setups
docs.examples.example2.body: Example using requests against the setups endpoint.
docs.examples.notes.title: Notes
docs.examples.notes.body: Use test/sandbox keys and respect rate limits before going to production.
setupGenerator.title: Setup Generator
setupGenerator.intro: Generate a sample setup based on asset, timeframe and risk profile.
setupGenerator.mockExplanation: This setup was generated based on your chosen parameters:
marketSummary.title: Market Summary AI
marketSummary.intro: Generate an AI-powered market overview for an asset and a time range.
marketSummary.mockSummary: The market summary is based on your parameters for
eventInterpreter.title: Event Interpreter
eventInterpreter.intro: Analyze a market event and get an AI-based view on bias, risk and volatility.
eventInterpreter.mockExplanation: The assessment is based on the event
riskManager.title: Risk Manager
riskManager.intro: Calculate position size and per-trade risk based on account size, risk percent and stop distance.
riskManager.result.title: Result
riskManager.result.hintTemplate: With this setup you risk about {{riskPercent}} % of your account. Ensure this matches your style.
riskManager.result.warning: Note: Trading with leverage and derivatives carries high risk. This is not financial advice.
aiToolsHub.title: AI Tools
aiToolsHub.intro: Use specialized AI modules for setups, market overviews, event analysis and risk management.
aiToolsHub.tools.setupGenerator.title: Setup Generator
aiToolsHub.tools.setupGenerator.descript: Generate sample setups based on asset, timeframe and risk profile.
aiToolsHub.tools.marketSummary.title: Market Summary AI
aiToolsHub.tools.marketSummary.descripti: Get an AI-powered market overview for sentiment, trend and events.
aiToolsHub.tools.eventInterpreter.title: Event Interpreter
aiToolsHub.tools.eventInterpreter.descri: Let macro/news events be scored and receive a view on bias, risk and volatility.
aiToolsHub.tools.riskManager.title: Risk Manager
aiToolsHub.tools.riskManager.description: Calculate position size, risk and max loss based on your account size.
aiToolsHub.tools.screenshotAnalysis.desc: Upload chart screenshots and get a visual AI assessment.
screenshotAnalysis.title: Screenshot Analysis
screenshotAnalysis.intro: The visual AI-based chart analysis will be available here soon.
screenshotAnalysis.comingSoonBody: The screenshot analysis module is currently in development. Soon you'll be able to upload chart images and receive AI-powered insights.
perception.howItWorksTitle: How does the Perception Engine work?
perception.howItWorksText: Modules score market structure, events and sentiment, produce confidence and pick a setup of the day.
perception.outputText: Daily 2040 setups with entry/SL/TP, scores and a setup of the day.
perception.engineMeta.title: Perception Engine status
premium.eventsTeaser.title: Events & Bias
premium.eventsTeaser.text: Todays high-impact events and bias feed into the ranking of setups.

events.subtitle: Macro, crypto and on-chain events feeding into the setup ranking.
events.symbols.label: Symbols

premium.info: You see all setups for today, split into free, premium and pro.
proNotice.title: Soon Pro-only
proNotice.text.default: This area will be available to Pro members only in the future. For now, you can still explore all content without restrictions.
proNotice.text.default.pro: You already enjoy full Pro access to everything in this area.
proNotice.text.setupsPremium: Premium and Pro setups will only be available to Pro members in the future. At the moment, you can still see the full list.
proNotice.text.setupsPremium.pro: Youre already enjoying full Pro access to all Premium and Pro setups.
proNotice.text.aiTools: The AI tools will become a Pro-only feature in the future. Right now, you can still use them without any limitations.
proNotice.text.aiTools.pro: You already have Pro access to all AI tools.
proNotice.text.backtesting: Backtesting capabilities will become an exclusive Pro feature. Currently, they are still unlocked for everyone.
proNotice.text.backtesting.pro: As a Pro member, you have full access to backtesting capabilities.
proNotice.text.docs: Extended documentation and deep-dive guides will be reserved for Pro members in the future. For now, everything remains open.
proNotice.text.docs.pro: As a Pro member, you have access to all extended documentation and deep-dive guides.

backtesting.overview.links.eventDesc: Analyze market reactions to events and evaluate setups.
backtesting.overview.links.replayDesc: Replay setups in historical market conditions.
legal.imprint.title: Imprint
legal.imprint.vatText: No VAT is charged in accordance with  19 UStG (Small Business Regulation).
legal.imprint.liabilityText: The content of this website has been created with the greatest care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of the information provided. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content in accordance with  7(1) TMG. According to  810 TMG, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information.
legal.imprint.externalLinksText: This website may contain links to external third-party websites. We have no influence over the content of these sites. The respective provider is responsible for the content. Permanent monitoring is not reasonable without concrete evidence of legal violations.
legal.imprint.noInvestmentAdviceText: All setups, analyses, entry/stop/take-profit levels and scores are provided for informational and educational purposes only. They do not constitute financial, investment or trading advice and should not be interpreted as recommendations to buy or sell financial instruments. Users act at their own risk. Past performance does not guarantee future results. AI-generated content may contain errors.
legal.imprint.mediaLawText: Content responsible person according to  18(2) MStV: the operator named above (Sole Proprietorship).
legal.imprint.hostingText: Hosting is provided by Vercel Inc., 440 N Barranca Ave #4133, Covina, CA 91723, USA.
legal.imprint.disputeText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution: https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. We are neither obligated nor willing to participate in dispute resolution procedures before a consumer arbitration board.
legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy.responsibleText: The entity responsible for data processing on this website is the operator listed in the imprint.
legal.privacy.dataProcessingText: We process personal data only to the extent necessary for operating this platform. This includes account data, usage data, log data, payment information and technical data. Processing is based on Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR.
legal.privacy.loginText: We use Clerk (Clerk Inc., USA) for authentication and account management. Clerk processes email, login behavior, session and device information. Details: https://clerk.com/privacy.
legal.privacy.paymentsText: Payments are processed via external providers (e.g., Stripe). Payment and invoice data and transaction details are processed as required for billing.
legal.privacy.hostingText: Our platform is hosted by Vercel Inc. (USA). Vercel processes logs, IP addresses and diagnostic data.
legal.privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies for essential functionality and analysis. Non-essential cookies require your consent under Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR.
legal.privacy.analyticsText: Analytics data may be used to improve the platform. Processing only occurs if legally permitted or based on consent.
legal.privacy.aiText: Our platform generates automated AI evaluations (e.g., sentiment, scores, setups). Inputs, metadata and model parameters may be processed. No sensitive data is stored long-term. AI outputs may contain errors.
legal.privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, rectification, deletion, restriction, objection and data portability under Art. 1521 GDPR.
legal.privacy.securityText: We use SSL/TLS encryption and modern security mechanisms to protect your data.
legal.privacy.retentionText: Personal data is stored only as long as necessary for platform usage or legal requirements.
legal.privacy.revocationText: You may revoke previously granted consent at any time with effect for the future.
legal.terms.title: Terms & Conditions
legal.terms.scopeText: These Terms & Conditions apply to all contracts between the operator and users regarding the provision of digital content, analyses, setups and tools.
legal.terms.servicesText: We provide a digital trading analysis platform. All content is for information and education only and does not constitute financial, investment or trading advice. Past performance does not guarantee future results. AI content may contain errors. No entitlement to certain functions or permanent availability exists.
legal.terms.subscriptionText: Premium and Pro features are available via paid subscriptions. Prices, durations, renewals and cancellation terms are shown during checkout. By purchasing digital access, you agree to immediate fulfillment and waive your right of withdrawal under Art. 356(5) BGB.
legal.terms.liabilityText: Trading financial instruments carries substantial risk. We assume no liability for losses or decisions made using our content. AI-generated or automated insights may contain errors.
legal.terms.finalText: German law applies. If any provision is invalid, the remaining provisions remain unaffected.
perception.narrative.title: Trader Market Note
perception.narrative.eventMedium: Macro-Risiko aktiv; Headlines knnen Spikes auslsen.
perception.narrative.confluenceNone: Kein klarer Edge; Signale bleiben gemischt.
perception.narrative.finalCautious: Handelbar mit Vorsicht rund um Risiken.

perception.scoreBreakdown.subtitle: Ring-Scores im berblick
perception.scoreBreakdown.tooltip.trend: Trendstrke, die das Setup sttzt oder schwcht.
perception.trend.heading: Trend
perception.trend.summary.medium: Trend gemischt – Timing entlang der Struktur wählen.
perception.trend.summary.high: Trend dominant – Pullbacks werden oft gekauft.
perception.trend.empty: Keine Trenddaten fuer dieses Setup vorhanden.
perception.bias.heading: Bias
perception.bias.empty: Keine Bias-Daten fuer dieses Setup vorhanden.

perception.event.noEvents: Keine nennenswerten Events in der Warteschlange
perception.event.summary.low: Kein Event-Risiko; kaum Impulse durch Nachrichten.
perception.event.summary.medium: Moderates Event-Risiko - Headlines im Blick behalten.
perception.event.empty: Keine Event-Daten fuer dieses Setup vorhanden.
perception.context.marketSecondary: Zeigt, wie der regelbasierte Bias zur Setup-Richtung passt.
perception.context.eventSecondary: Bevorstehende Katalysatoren und ihr erwarteter Einfluss.
perception.context.structureSecondary: Nutze Schlüsselzonen und letzte Swings für Einstiege.
perception.context.volatilitySecondary: Passe Positionsgröße und Stops an die aktuelle Volatilität an.

perception.sentiment.summary.extreme_bea: Extrem baerisches Sentiment warnt vor Gegenbewegungen.

perception.onboarding.drivers.title: Treiber & Risiken

perception.onboarding.details.descriptio: Vertiefende Infos wie Marktkontext, Event-Risiko, Narrative und AI-Analyse.

perception.orderflow.noData.headline: Zu wenig Intraday-Daten
perception.orderflow.noData.body: Der Orderflow bleibt neutral, weil aktuell zu wenig Intraday-AktivitÇÏt vorliegt, um ein klares Flow-Signal abzuleiten.
perception.signalQuality.label: Signalqualitaet
perception.signalQuality.reason.trendBia: Trend und Bias sind klar aligned.
perception.metaSignals.heading: Setup-Qualität & Überzeugung
perception.signalQuality.description: Bewertet, wie gut Trend, Event, Bias, Sentiment und Orderflow zusammenpassen – inklusive Event-Risiko und Flow-Stärke.
perception.confidence.description: Misst die Überzeugung der Engine auf Basis von Stärke, Konsistenz und Kohärenz der Ring-Signale sowie der Marktstabilität.
